messages.subject: Where do you find a pen pal?
messages.msgSnippet: My son said today he d like to start writing to a boy about his age. He watched Arthur today and it was the episode where Arthur had a pen pal from Turkey.
messages.messageBody:
My son said today he'd like to start writing to a boy about his age.
He watched Arthur today and it was the episode where Arthur had a
pen pal from Turkey. He's really interested in either writing
someone who lives in San Antonio, where we will be moving in 06, but
he's also interested in writing with someone that lives somewhere
we've never been.
Soo, if you have a son who is around 6 1/2 and would be interested,
please email me off list. Thanks.
Nisha
nishamartin @ yahoo.com without the spaces...
